note.p: Death: Home Lodge, Great Amwell, Hertfordshire (02 July 1890)
Memberships: FGS London and Paris; Soc Antiq; Inst Brit Architects; Architects; Archaeol Inst; &c
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (under Mylne, William Chadwell)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1890 vol 48 pp xx-xxi signed by W B D
Notes: William J Hamilton and Joseph Prestwich have each signed the certificate twice
